description: Looking for that traditional denim feel in a slimmer straight fit men's jean that is durable, with a little stretch, and something you could easily wear to work or a night out? Funny you would end up here, looking at the Feener Jean. What if prAna threw in some classic 5-pocket styling, and feature organic cotton to reduce their impact on your favorite outdoor adventures?
name: Prana Feener Jeans, 34" Inseam - Mens
